Room.Name: Cast Iron Shields
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the Cast Iron Shields shop in Leonardo's Foundry.
Room.LongDescription: Shields are essential to any warrior's equipment lists, and only the finest iron and metal shields are sold here. All shields are pretty generic, but as is usually the case, the larger the shield, the more protection it give you. A good shield complements all the other armor you are wearing.
